purpose: Position TITAN as a new way of working, not just another PMR, using pop culture visual reference (Space Odyssey) to communicate transformation.
core_message: Pharmacy didn't need another PMR. It needed a new way of working. Titan flipped the script.
summary: Single image campaign using Space Odyssey monolith visual reference to position TITAN as transformative new way of working, contrasting legacy PMR limitations with TITAN's modern approach.
